. @tradeonetwo 5. I want to know where a company in Canada that I have never heard of got me name & number
. @tradeonetwo 4. I want to know is it company policy to tell people you have cold called to calm down and listen to what the caller

. @tradeonetwo 2. When I asked Tina was it company practice to speak to people this way she yes that I needed to just calm down & listen
